blocks.prompt: Decide whether each of the following is an example of technology.

items.label: Smartphone
items.explanation: Designed by humans to perform many tasks.

items.label: Pencil
items.explanation: A tool designed to help people write.

items.label: Chair
items.explanation: Designed to support people when sitting.

items.label: Tree
items.explanation: A natural object, not designed by humans.

items.label: Washing machine
items.explanation: Uses systems and mechanisms to clean clothes.

items.label: Road
items.explanation: A human-designed structure to enable transport.
